title: Tribunal
body:
When are we getting a tribunal or equivalent? Many of us are waiting  for it to happen so a lot of the trash will be thrown out. Totally sick of losing ranked games because people are feeding, too busy trash talking to actually play, have absolutely no idea how the play the game or rage because someone ks'ed them or took some cs while they werent there to take it. So many toxics and people that dont care about winning being part of a team. We desperately need a tribunal or equivalent to get rid of the trash that dont deserve to be able to play so tose of us that do try to play well and want to win can have a much more enjoyable experience.

Anyone that is actually from RIOT care to enlighten us?

replies.body:
Oh God...

We have a tribunal!!
If you have ever bothered to report someone it has a message:

"Your report will be reviewed by Tribunal. Thank you for your report" That's wat i remember at the top of my head
We don't have a tribunal (no server does), that is just an automated message that pops up before the report is recorded and filed.

> 
> Anyone that is actually from RIOT care to enlighten us?

If you want to get better at league and get to a higher elo you need to start playing like such. That means going negative is not an acceptable thing to you, CSing is high priority, Knowing when to go in and when to not, knowing when to roam and when to lane the list goes on but tl;dr the ranking system is fair and so is match making.

If you get a troll once in a while sure its annoying but its not the reason you're bronze 5.

(Just like its not the reason im B2 on this account.)

Chill. A good and effective tribunal takes time to establish, which is why they are changing the old one (it didn't actually work well). 
All you can do for now is report players, block them and move on. If you are finding ranked to toxic for you then go play normals until the new tribunal is rolled out.
